name: A Present Mystery
description:
Description -
This game is a 3D Voxel art game that utilizes FMOD Studio and Unity
All Art and Audio were created solely for this game. (Only Original assets)
Created for Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam

Art & Animation - Adassio ST (https://adassio-studios.itch.io/)

Audio & Music - Ariel Kim (https://pixxer.itch.io/)

Programming - IndieEclipse, Cas Sievers, Garlock (https://garlock009.itch.io/)

Writing - DisgustingHobo, GaomonAndLucario (https://gaomonandlucario.itch.io/)

UI design - Cas Sievers

Production - Luke Seymour (https://luke-seymour.itch.io/)

Due to numerous bugs we have our docs to show the work of our writers (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pF0dO3urxD-LuyiWXQFKcmxtca4753n3YJDenZ2eU0U/...)
